nodes.bodyText:
should this buildpath be updated to:
    io.openliberty.jakarta.annotation.2.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.cdi.3.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.ejb.4.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.messaging.3.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.servlet.5.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.persistence.3.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.transaction.2.0;version=latest,\
    io.openliberty.jakarta.validation.3.0;version=latest
nodes.diffHunk:

+src: \
+	fat/src,\
+	test-applications/helpers/DatabaseManagement/src,\
+	test-applications/jpabootstrap/src,\
+	test-framework/src
+
+fat.project: true
+tested.features: el-3.0, jpa-3.0, servlet-5.0, cdi-3.0, beanValidation-3.0, enterprisebeanslite-4.0
+
+# Dependencies may be local bundles (e.g. com.ibm.websphere.javaee.servlet.3.1)
+#      or binaries from Artifactory (e.g. commons-logging:commons-logging)
+-buildpath: \

nodes.bodyText: When #14235 is delivered, I can link this to the common jpa test framework project and get rid of them entirely.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText:
Don't we use DDL generation? If this is necessary, can we change to:
<property name="jakarta.persistence.schema-generation.database.action" value="drop-and-create"/>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+<persistence xmlns="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence"
+        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+        xsi:schemaLocation="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd"
+        version="3.0">
+    <persistence-unit name="JPAPU">
+    	<properties>
+			<!-- EclipseLink should create the database schema automatically -->
+			<property name="eclipselink.ddl-generation" value="drop-and-create-tables" />

nodes.bodyText: Don't think we have that set up for this test, a todo for the future.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+<persistence xmlns="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence"
+        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+        xsi:schemaLocation="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence/persistence_3_0.xsd"
+        version="3.0">
+    <persistence-unit name="JPAPU">
+    	<properties>
+			<!-- EclipseLink should create the database schema automatically -->
+			<property name="eclipselink.ddl-generation" value="drop-and-create-tables" />
